name: mcp-map-server
description: MCP App Server example with CesiumJS 3D globe and geocoding

scripts.build: npx tsc --noEmit && npx vite build && npx tsc -p tsconfig.server.json && npx esbuild server.ts --bundle --platform=node --format=esm --outfile=dist/server.js --packages=external && npx esbuild main.ts --bundle --platform=node --format=esm --outfile=dist/index.js --packages=external --banner:js="#!/usr/bin/env node"
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run watch" "npm run serve:http"
